name: Peach Muffins
author: FBGMOMOF4
summary: In my hurry to use up some peaches, I came up with this muffin recipe. It turned out so good, just like peach cobbler in a muffin, that I thought I'd share it with everyone! This is also really good bread! Just increase the baking time to 1 hour at 350 degrees F and use 2 loaf pans.
ingredients: 2 cups peeled, pitted, and chopped peaches
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease the bottoms and sides of 16 muffin cups, or line with paper liners
In a large bowl, mix the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt
In a separate bowl, mix the oil, eggs, and sugar
Stir the oil mixture into the flour mixture just until moist
Spoon into the prepared muffin cups
Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean
Cool 10 minutes before turning out onto wire racks to cool completely
